name: Quarry
ability: -1 investment cost for businesses
effect: Civ loses 1 population.

name: Tanner
ability: At the end of the round, draw 3 cards.  Choose one to add to demand.  Put the rest back.
effect: Player who produce food: +2 gold.  Everyone else: lose 1 zero-cost business.

name: Baker
ability: Steal 1 gold each round from a player of your choice who does not produce food.
effect: Each player producing science draws a card from the next deck, then discards a card.

name: Farmer
ability: You may draw the top card from the demand pile.
effect: Each player loses their oldest business.

name: Hunter
ability: When built, civ gains 1 population.
effect: Players without spears lose their next turn.

name: Philosopher
ability: On your turn, you may peek at the top card of the future event pile.
effect: Draw a card and add it to the demand pile.

name: Gatherer
ability: You do not pay taxes
effect: Players producing food: lose 1 food contract.

name: Shaman
ability: Before events are evaluated, you may move one to the demand pile.
effect: Civ loses 1/3rd its gold, rounded down.

name: Inventor
ability: When drawing after starting a business, draw 2 instead and put 1 back.
effect: Players producing food lose 2 gold.

name: Guard
ability: Whenever a player starts a business, you gain 1g.
effect: Players producing food gain 2 gold.

name: Guide
ability: On your turn, you may peek at the bottom card of the current event deck.
effect: Players with less than 5 gold, gain 2 gold from the treasury.

name: Mentor
ability: On your turn, you may peek at one face-down business.
effect: Each player discards 2 investments on unfinished businesses.

name: Council
ability: You may decide to not take a contract.
effect: Civ gains 4g

name: Judge
ability: You decide ties for contracts.
effect: Discard all happiness demanded

name: Prophet
ability: You may play 2 events per turn if the first one doesn’t end the round.
effect: All players producing stone, +2g

name: Stone Cutter
ability: You may invest in a business the same turn you start it.
effect: Civ +1 pop, +3 gold

name: Warrior
ability: If the event row has 0 cards, you may play an event there.
effect: Uncontracted businesses earn 1g each

name: Spearmaker
ability: When built, you may put a card from the demand pile as a contract on any business.
effect: Civ loses ½ its gold rounded down, and loses 1 pop

name: Mason
ability: Before events are evaluated, swap two of them.
effect: Civ +1 pop

name: Alchemist
ability: You may draw from age II.
effect: Players producing hides gain 2g each.

name: Warehouse
ability: When built, draw a card.  If you lose this ability, discard a card or a business.
effect: Civ loses 10g, reduced 2g per happiness provided

name: Miner
ability: Gain 2g from the supply on your turn.
effect: Civ loses 1 population

name: Farmer
ability: When built, you may cancel another contract.
effect: Remove the oldest 2 barbarian icons from the demand pile.

name: Taxman
ability: After taxes, gain 2g from the treasury.
effect: Remove the oldest happiness from demand until happiness demanded equals happiness provided.

name: Accountant
ability: Business gold costs are reduced by 1
effect: Civ loses ½ its gold rounded down, and loses 1 pop

name: Smelter
ability: Contract payouts increased by 1
effect: Players producing hides gain 4g each

name: Grocer
ability: To finish building, close a food business.  Add its contract to demand pile.
effect: Each player loses 1 uncontracted business.

name: Castle
ability: To finish building, close a spear/sword business.  Add its contract to the demand pile.
effect: No contracts are paid this round.

name: Swordmaker
ability: Gold gained by the barbarians is given to you instead.
effect: Add 3 cards to the demand pile, one at a time.

name: Trade Post
ability: For each business you have when this is built, gain 1g.
effect: Each player discards 2 investments on unfinished businesses.

name: Skinner
ability: As your action, you may discard then draw a card.
effect: Discard all science contracts.

name: Hut
ability: You may shut down a business on your turn.
effect: Discard all spear demand

name: Market
ability: On your turn, you may contract the market with any three goods of your choice.
effect: Discard a number of cards from draw pile equal to contracted science.

name: Bank
ability: When civ runs out of money, you get 7g
effect: Players without spears or swords lose their next turn.

name: Laboratory
ability: If any event reveals 2nd sci in the row, gain 15g
effect: Players with less than 8 gold, gain 3 gold from the treasury.

name: Archives
ability: You may draw any of the top cards of the discard piles.
effect: All players producing stone, +4g

name: Museum
ability: When finished, keep investments underneath.  You may draw from these, even after contracted.
effect: Civ +1 pop, +3 gold

name: Construction
ability: Players must pay you 2g to start a business.
effect: Player who produce food: +4 gold.  Everyone else: lose 1 zero-cost business.

name: Coffee Roaster
ability: You may invest in a business twice on your turn.
effect: Civ gains 4g

name: Crane
ability: When your next building is finished, place it on top of this and draw a card.
effect: Civ loses 1/3rd its gold, rounded down.

name: Union
ability: Other players must pay you 3/2/1g to close a business.
effect: Uncontracted businesses earn 2g each

name: Knight
ability: If the event row has 0 or 1 cards, you may play an event there.
effect: Civ +2 pop

name: Hay Maker
ability: Playing an event is a free action.
effect: Civ loses 1 population.

name: Investor
ability: AAA, place a card under, then draw.  EotR, gain 1g per card from supply per card.
effect: Each player producing science draws a card from the next deck, then discards a card.

name: University
ability: You may draw from from age III.  If III is exhausted, from age IV.
effect: Players producing food lose 4 gold.

name: Gravedigger
ability: When built, look through last age’s discard pile, add a card to your hand, then discard.
effect: Players producing food gain 4 gold.

name: Mint
ability: Your contracts are paid for from the supply
effect: Draw two cards and add them to the demand pile.

name: Armory
ability: Before contracts are paid, take 4g from treasury
effect: Civ loses 15g, reduced 3g per happiness provided

name: Cow Farmer
ability: Starting a business is a free action.
effect: Each player producing science draws a card from the next deck, then discards a card.

name: Fruit Stand
ability: When built, you may discard the oldest of any resource demanded.
effect: Players producing bronze: you may discard 1 contract.
Discard all hide-providing businesses.

ability: After playing an event, you may discard a face-up event.

effect: Destroy all spear providers.

ability: Each turn, you may discard a card and then draw a card.

name: Com Bank
ability: AAA, put 1g here.  Each round, add 1/3rd rounding down.  You get all gold once contracted or EOG.

name: Gravedigger
ability: When built, look through any age’s discard pile add a card to your hand, then discard.

name: Cafe
ability: 2 actions per turn.
